title: Logging JSON: Add support for "flat" MDC
body:
### Description

Greetings!

By now, I don't see any option to modify the structure of MDC in JSON log output. The only option one has is "nested" mdc object, like `... mdc: {"my_soopah_doopah_context_value": "cheese"} ...`. The same goes for NDC values.

I can see the idea behind having structured MDC (as well as NDC). Still, I think it would be nice to give developers an option to decide weather they have nested MDC or just flat fields in root JSON log object (at the same level with `timestamp`,  `processName` and so on).

Maybe there is a way to achieve this behaviour but I couldn't find any configuration for it throughout docs.

### Implementation ideas

I don't have it right now, but I'm pretty sure I can be the one who will implement it)
